job.title: Software Engineer, Application Data Loading
job.description: the application data loading lunadb team builds the internal frameworks powering all data loading in the asana web application the team enables asana engineers to move fast by collaborating with both product teams on how to design new features and infrastructure teams to ensure the scalability and performance of asana we combine the best ideas from other web technologies with our internal graph server taking into account asanas scale and unique product needsltbrgtltbrgtengineers on this team are closely aware of the product we are building and the needs of the teams working directly on new asana features we find ways to accelerate this while also considering the performance of the application as a whole and its behavior as a distributed systemltbrgtltbrgtwere looking for an experienced software engineer to further improve the power and simplicity of our frameworks youll contribute to extending our powerful inhouse graph query language as well as the apis which allow our dataintensive application to be highly performant while automatically responding when users make changes the team balances short term improvements to unblock new features with largescale reimagining of how software is written at the companyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtwhat youll achieveltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt produce highquality design and code which enable new ways
